mapper.select: SELECT t.*,t1.productionDate,t1.expiryDate FROM bas_in_out_info t left join bas_inventory t1 on t.chargeItemId = t1.chargeItemId where t.ioId = #{ioId} and t.batch = t1.batch
SELECT count(*) FROM bas_in_out_info t left join bas_inventory t1 on t.chargeItemId = t1.chargeItemId where 1=1 and t.beid = #{systemSearchFormBean.beid} ${filter} and t.batch = t1.batch
